thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Naomi Fasulo

author: Naomi Fasulo
title: Naomi Fasulo
text: THE BEST! I have bought a lot of cars in my day...I have never had a great experience like this one! I had researched the car I wanted for months...they had the best price with the lowest miles, one owner, with a warranty still in place for the car I wanted. John and Cody answered all my questions and they even had someone with a check in hand to buy the car i got on the day I was going in to test drive it. I had emailed the day before and talked to Cody the next morning telling him I would be by after work. They did not sell the car out from under me as most would have...they never knew if I would show up...they simply told the guy that they had someone interested and would call him if I didn't want it.THEY are awesome people to work with and I would HIGHLY reccomend them to anyone looking for a great car at the best price in town!
